nsr.loui.playingcards.contrib

Class SwitchableAutoSortedCards<T extends java.lang.Enum>

  • java.lang.Object
    • nsr.loui.playingcards.cards.BaseCards
      • nsr.loui.playingcards.cards.Cards
        • nsr.loui.playingcards.cards.AutoSortedCards
          • nsr.loui.playingcards.contrib.SwitchableAutoSortedCards<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - Enum type act as tag to each comparators.

    public class SwitchableAutoSortedCards<T extends java.lang.Enum>
extends AutoSortedCards
    Experimental class to order-switchable auto sorted cards. This class has several deck instances for each order-rule, so it spend memory.

    • Constructor Detail

      • SwitchableAutoSortedCards

        public SwitchableAutoSortedCards(java.lang.String name,
                                 java.lang.String deckName,
                                 Observer observer,
                                 java.util.Map<T,CardComparator> tagToComparator,
                                 T defaultTag)
        Parameters:
        name - this cards' name
        deckName - if you pass null, name related tag's that will use instead.
        observer - observer. DON'T pass null, DO use stub instead.
        tagToComparator - map binds tag to comparator.
        defaultTag - to indicate default order mode. it must be included in above map.

        public void switchComparator(T tag)

        Parameters:
